description: A collection of circles in a thin teardrop-shaped formation with the pointed end facing the top right corner of the picture. There are three thin lines of circles extending downwards along the bottom of the teardrop-shaped formation and a curved line of circles stemming from the point of the teardrop-shaped formation. Each circle has a different number in the center denoting how many lines stem from that point. There is a brown triangle on the left side of the teardrop-shaped formation.

author.name: VertexArchive
author.description: An UNOFFICIAL archive of the New York Times' Vertex puzzle. This account is not affiliated with the NY Times. I just like the triangles.
